about_the_game:
How would we survive if a zombie apocalypse became a reality? Inspired by that question, we present the post-apocalyptic survival RPG game, "Dive Into The Survival."

A world that once held ordinary days has suddenly collapsed, and humanity faces the brink of extinction. In a world overrun with zombies, you must build your base, gather survivors, and protect yourself from the constant threats that loom over you.

Key Features


[Open World]: Explore various regions and buildings to scavenge resources necessary for survival.

[Multiplayer]: Learn how to maintain humanity, cooperate with others, and keep hope alive even in dire situations.

[Building]: Construct and fortify your own base to withstand the zombie onslaught.

[Survival Elements]: Manage realistic survival needs such as hunger, thirst, and fatigue to keep yourself alive.

[Weapon and Equipment Crafting]: Gather materials to craft a variety of weapons and gear to enhance your protection.

[Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle]: Experience a realistic survival environment with weather changes and a dynamic day-night cycle.

[Parkour]: Use simple parkour techniques to traverse obstacles quickly and efficiently.

Jump into Dive Into The Survival now! Test your survival skills and fight to live in this zombie-infested world alongside your friends!

🚧 This Game is Still in Development! 🚧

Hello, and thank you for visiting the Dive Into The Survival (DITS) store page. This game is currently in development, and we are committed to creating a more polished and engaging experience by incorporating your feedback. There may be some shortcomings, so please keep that in mind when making your purchase. We are dedicated to meeting your expectations through regular updates.
